org.cougaar.core.thread
Class PropagatingScheduler

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.core.thread.Scheduler
      org.cougaar.core.thread.PropagatingScheduler

public class PropagatingScheduler
extends Scheduler

The standard hiearchical thread service implementation uses this extension of Scheduler to handle the propagation of rights.
